body_html:
Yes, this PR is not the right way to go about doing things. Instead, we should fix the MSVC build on newer architectures.

@yf225 Do you think we should do a build-only run for a newer CUDA arch, on both Windows and Linux?

@yf225 Do you think we should do a build-only run for a newer CUDA arch, on both Windows and Linux?
body:
Yes, this PR is not the right way to go about doing things. Instead, we should fix the MSVC build on newer architectures.

@yf225 Do you think we should do a build-only run for a newer CUDA arch, on both Windows and Linux?
